name: PONGRIPPER
description:
PONGRIPPER

ELECTRONIC TV GAME WITH COLOR-BASED SCORING

CONTROLS Player 1: WASD Player 2: Arrow Keys Reset: Home Mute: M Escape: Esc

The contacts in the credits are, unfortunately, incorrect.

Craig, the designer, can be reached at @fartwav

Matthew, the composer, can be reached at matthewcloughhunter@gmail.com

More of Matthew's work can be found here: https://soundcloud.com/mc-funter

All feedback is appreciated.

Thanks for playing!
